name: PokerTimes
description:
A simple and easy to use Poker Timer for your next Texas Hold Em event!
● A clean and simple timer showing the clock, blinds, and ante
● Easy set up of tournaments
● Tournament Wizard - Create a tournament quickly by entering a few key pieces of information and let the app do the work for you.
● Save tournaments to the device for the next time you host an event
● Enable or disable audible alerts at the end of any level
● Supports both portrait and landscape mode
● Dark Mode - for higher contrast and readability

Includes an In-App Purchase for:
● Remote Control : Use a second iOS device to remotely control the timer. The remote has the ability to change the clock time, advance to previous and next levels and to pause the clock. You can also edit future levels directly from the remote while the clock is still running!
